# thunder_system_ip6_stats (Data Source)

`thunder_system_ip6_stats`: IPv6 related statistics

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
data "thunder_system_ip6_stats" "thunder_system_ip6_stats" {
}
output "get_system_ip6_stats" {
  value = ["${data.thunder_system_ip6_stats.thunder_system_ip6_stats}"]
}
```
